channel.title: Help... Java Won't Work For My Server
channel.description:
Okay, i recently updated java... it was java 5.0 update 9 , now 5.0 update 10 ... and mod tahoraks guide says u need 5.0 or 6.0 .... i dunno whats up with it, its being gay and can someone help me?
It's still saying i need JDK 5.0 Or 6.0 ... and now it won't run the server at all, it comes up with this bull crap again:
'java' is not recognized blah blah ....blah, some more freakin blah... and a blah blah blah more blah blah bah, are u tired? cuz theres more blah blah blah
Keep Reading ---->
Blah BLAH BLAH BLAH
Okay now we are done! BLAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
